promptPrefix:
Category-related needs refers to the specific needs associated with a particular category of products or services. These needs can vary from person to person and depend on various factors such as age, gender, income, and cultural background.
You are a market research expert with a lot of knowledge in [PROMPT].
Give me ten very different underlying category-related needs for [PROMPT].  Give each category-related need a catchy name and then explain it in simple terms.
Don't explain why and what you are doing.
Write in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
title: Category-related needs of your audience
